channel.title: Using Items on Items?
channel.description: So i added the ruined dragon armour pieces to my server.. and i want it so i can use the pieces on each other and get a d plate. Does anyone know how to do that? if you know how can you tell meh please?

item.title: Using Items on Items?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

first of all, how are is your item on item handled?
second, base?

Read full topic

item.title: Using Items on Items?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

Idk how to do it with 3 items, but I’ll show you an example of it with 2 items…

if(itemUsed == 16015 && useWith == 1540) { if(playerLevel[13] > 98) { deleteItem(16015, getItemSlot(16015), 1); deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1); addItem(2621, 1); sM("You attach the Draconic Visage on your Shield!"); } else { sM("You need to have 99 smithing to make the shield."); } } if(itemUsed == 1540 && useWith == 16015) { if(playerLevel[13] > 98) { deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1); deleteItem(16015, getItemSlot(16015), 1); addItem(2621, 1); sM("You attach the Draconic Visage on your Shield!"); } else { sM("You need to have 99 smithing to make the shield."); } }

Thats mine for combining Draconic Visage with Anti-Fire Shield… Maybe you can use it to help you with combining the dragon pieces?

Read full topic
